opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Doris Jimerson v. New York State Department of Social Services

opinion:
413 U.S. 910

93 S.Ct. 3070

37 L.Ed.2d 1021

Doris JIMERSON et al., appellants,
v.
NEW YORK STATE DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL SERVICES, et al.

No. 72-5939.

Supreme Court of the United States

June 25, 1973

1

Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Judgment vacated and case remanded to the United States District Court for the Western District of New York for further consideration in light of New York State Dept. of Social Services v. Dublino, 413 U.S. 405, 93 S.Ct. 2507, 37 L.Ed.2d 688 (1973).

2

Mr. Justice DOUGLAS would note probable jurisdiction and set case for oral argument.
